abstract: Photographer Edwin J Torres takes pictures of Bronx as tribute to borough's beauty and vitality; says images taken over three-year period remind him how quickly neighborhoods change and how much harder he needs to work to document it all.
snippet: Edwin J. Torres realized while away at college that there was no place like his home borough, and he has spent years documenting it....
lead_paragraph: Edwin J. Torres realized while away at college that there was no place like his home borough, and he has spent years documenting it.
